Title: I Was a Parish Priest
Writer: Vicente Escrivá (screenplay), Vicente Escrivá (story), Ramón D. Faraldo
Actors: Claude Laydu, Francisco Rabal, José Marco Davó, Fernando Sancho
Plot: 1930: Andrés, a young priest just out of the seminary, is intended to the imaginary village of Aldemoz, a poor mining parish. There will try by all means to end, through the Gospel, the justified anger of the miners, who live in a bloody misery and social injustice.
